he Lesser Hall of Perfect Understanding was a large dormitory cave found within the Horseshoe Temple Oasis in the Quoya Desert of the Hordelands during the mid 14 century DR.
The cave was located on the far left side of the great chamber level of the temple. The dorms measured  wide by  long. Three passages served as entryways into the cave.
During the temples heyday, the hall was used as personal quarters for all of the abbots who lived within.
The Lesser Hall of Perfect Understanding was occupied by an oni named Halbasho the Smart in the .
